title: Insights | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Discover new perspectives and gain valuable insights. Read participant interviews, informative articles and expert opinions on a variety of topics.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Discover new perspectives and gain valuable insights here, featuring informative articles and expert opinions on a variety of topics. Stay informed and inspired.
Shedding Light on Workplace Safety in Social Services
These niche courses equip professionals in social service agencies with the skills to optimise health and safety at the workplace.
Health Sciences, Social Sciences, Workplace Safety and Health
What’s needed for stackable microcredentials toward a degree?
Forest Tan describes how to begin creating a flexible pathway where learners can accumulate microcredentials aligned to industry that can stack toward a degree.
How to coach in-employment lifelong learners for success
A team from Singapore Institute of Technology offers insights from working with in-employment learners who are seeking to upskill by studying for degrees.
The future of learning: How competency-based education is shaping skills development

As the shelf-life of skills shortens, it's time to rethink the traditional approach to upskilling. With competency-based education, employees are able to master the skills that directly impact their careers, and employers are able to assess competency accurately.
Armed with a Postgraduate Diploma in Sonography, Florence Tan is ready for advanced clinical practice and leadership.

Is learning new skills still relevant after 40? This was the question Resendos faced while contemplating taking up a postgraduate certificate course at SIT. His decision to constantly upskill himself shaped his entrepreneurial journey.
Business Management, Design Innovation, Career Growth and Transition

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.

updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");

    function updateCheckboxVal(attrName) {
        if (attrName) {
            var checkboxName = attrName + "_checkbox";
            var intAttr = document.getElementsByName(attrName);
            var intCheckbox = document.getElementsByName(checkboxName);
            if (intCheckbox && intAttr) {
                intAttr[0].value = intCheckbox[0].checked;
            }
        }
    }

    function updatesUponSubmit() {
        var checkboxes = document.querySelectorAll('[data-group="check-box-group"]');
        var boxSelected = false;
        for (var i = 0, l = checkboxes.length; i < l; i++) {
            if (checkboxes[i].checked) {
                boxSelected = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (boxSelected) {
            var gmt8Date = new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { timeZone: "Asia/Singapore" });
            const now = new Date().toUTCString();
            var optinEmailDate = document.getElementsByName("OptinEmailDate");
            var createdDate = document.getElementsByName("CreatedDate");
            var formSubmissionDate = document.getElementsByName("FormSubmissionDate");
            var primaryKey = document.getElementsByName("PrimaryKey");
            var getEmail = document.getElementById("email").value;
            var getWebsource = document.getElementById("websourceID").value;

            optinEmailDate[0].value = now;
            createdDate[0].value = now;
            formSubmissionDate[0].value = now;
            primaryKey[0].value = getEmail + getWebsource + gmt8Date;
			
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");
			
        } else {
            var checkboxes = document.querySelector('.error-message');
            checkboxes.classList.add('active');
            return false;
        }
    }
